document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

subSubSection.paragraph:
Endagria bipunctatum Staudinger, 1887
, Stett. Ent. Z. 48: 94.

LT: SW Kleinasien , Merw, Marash [ Turkey ]. Type material ( holotype ) in MHUB
.

= Dyspessa bipunctata marginepunctata
Wiltshire , 1939
, Entomol.’s Rec. J. Var. 51 (7–8): 135.

LT: Ahwaz [Ahvaz, Khuzestan , Iran ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

= Dyspessa bipunctata brandti
Wiltshire , 1946b
, Entomol.’s Rec. J. Var. 58 (3): 29.

LT: Ardekan , fruit-gardens, Fars [SW Iran ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.
